targets.rawSql:
WITH last_point AS ( SELECT MAX(time) AS last_time FROM ue WHERE time BETWEEN $__timeFrom AND $__timeTo )
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(pci)) as "Cells with Active UEs", COUNT(DISTINCT(rnti)) as "Active UEs" FROM ue CROSS JOIN last_point WHERE time >= last_point.last_time - INTERVAL '5s' AND time <= last_point.last_time
SELECT time, SUM(dl_brate) AS total_dl_brate FROM ue WHERE time >= $__timeFrom AND time <= $__timeTo GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT time, pci, to_hex(CAST(rnti AS INT)) as rnti, dl_brate, ul_brate, ((100.0 * dl_nof_nok) / (dl_nof_ok + dl_nof_nok)) AS dl_bler, ((100.0 * ul_nof_nok) / (ul_nof_ok + ul_nof_nok)) AS ul_bler, dl_mcs, ul_mcs, dl_bs, bsr, dl_ri, ul_ri, cqi, pusch_snr_db, ta_ns, pusch_rsrp_db, last_phr FROM ue WHERE time >= $__timeFrom AND time <= $__timeTo ORDER BY time
